alert.note: Alert for Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 12:07PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pima, west central Cochise and northeastern Santa Cruz Counties through 1245 PM MST... At 1207 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sonoita, or 21 miles southwest of Benson, moving east at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whetstone, Sonoita and Elgin. This includes the following highways... Route 82 between mile markers 33 and 49. Route 83 between mile markers 27 and 41. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Dragoon, Mule, Huachuca and Santa Rita Mountains including Bisbee, Canelo Hills, Madera Canyon; Upper San Pedro River Valley including Sierra Vista, Benson
